channel.title: react on 么了's 博客
channel.description: Recent content in react on 么了's 博客

item.title: React Router
item.description: function App() { return( <Router> <Link to="/home">首页</Link> <Link to="/content">内容</Link> <Link to="/about">关于</Link> <Switch> <Route path="/home"> <Home /> </Route> <Route path="/content"> <Content /> </Route> <Route path="/about"> <About /> </Route> // 重定向 <Redirect exact from="/" to="home" /> // 404页面 <Route path="*"> <NoMatch/> </Route> </Switch> </Router> ) } function Home() { return <h2>记账</h2>; } function About() { return <h2>记账</h2>; } function Content() { return <h2>记账</h2>; } function NoMatch() { return <h2>页面不存在404</h2>; }
